jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
At Gojek, Product Designers are thought partners for PMs, engineering, business, and research. They provide the user's point of view to the discussions and collaborate with the rest of the product team to ensure that users will end up with the best solution to the issue at hand.
 
With a deep understanding of how the technology works and interest in how users behave, the best product designers can answer any problem with a combination of well-defined flow, wireframes, information architecture, user journey, and/or storyboard.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Plan and design wireframe/flow for any feature/product they are working on, and ensure that all projects are delivered on time
  • Work with engineers, product managers, interaction designers, copywriters, and creatives, to analyze and ship features and product improvements via regular cadences such as design syncs, daily stand-ups, retrospectives, etc.
  • Learn everything you can about our customers through data o drive your design decisions, seek product ideas and feedback, gather requirements, create wireframes and workflows
  • Define clear design documented feature and well-scoped requirements documents that are easily understood by technical and non-technical audiences
  • Participate in user research initiatives with the product manager and user research teams to understand customer problems and identify and iterate on solutions

• Love beautifully designed screens and animations, but above all prioritized users’ need
  • Possessed insatiable curiosity to know your users, and how to make their lives better
  • Not afraid to get your hands dirty to find out root caused of an issue, or to validate your design, either through quantitative or qualitative research
  • Have some experience working in a product development environment
